title: Petabyte tapes are on the horizon - but don’t hold your breath
description: Group behind LTO announces update to roadmap but doesn’t give any timeline.

title: New Android 13 patch fixes battery drain issue and more for Pixel phones
description: September will see a lot of fixes to Android with the first round coming out today to Pixel owners.

title: One of the world's biggest hotel chains hit by cyberattack
description: Holiday Inn, Crowne Plaza, Regent, and more, have had their tech infrastructure compromised by a cyberattack.

title: AirPods Pro 2 are harder to lose, last longer, and sound better
description: There aren't many brand new features to be found in Apple's new AirPods Pro, but nearly all the original ones have been upgraded.

title: AMD decides it has so many laptop CPUs coming, they need new names
description: Hopefully the new naming scheme will work well for non-techie types as well as PC enthusiasts.

title: iOS 16 is coming soon - release date, new features and supported devices
description: iOS 16 brings a redesigned lock screen, better privacy features, and big updates for Messages, such as undo send.

title: iOS 16.2 is here: new features, supported iPhones, and all you need to know
description: iOS 16 brings a redesigned lock screen, better privacy features, and big updates for Messages, such as undo send.

title: Apple Watch Series 8, Apple Watch Ultra, and Apple Watch SE 2 announced
description: The Apple Watch Series 8 didn't come alone: it was joined by the cheaper SE 2 and premium Apple Watch Ultra

title: watchOS 9: New fitness metrics, sports modes, health features, updates & more
description: watchOS 9 is packing a host of new features that look set to improve your Apple Watch experience.

title: Bose announces QuietComfort Earbuds II, with next-gen noise-canceling skills
description: The new Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II bring super-adaptive noise blocking, in a seriously small and light package.

title: iPhone 14 and 14 Pro launch live Q+A — all the insight from on the ground
description: Want to know about the new Watch Pro, AirPods Pro 2 or even iPhone 14? We're here to help.

title: The new PS5 update is perfect if you don't have a 4K TV yet
description: Sony's latest update finally introduces support for 1440p resolutions.

title: 6 things we want to see during Marvel Studios' D23 Expo 2022 panel
description: Here are the top six things we want to see during Marvel Studios' presentation at D23 Expo 2022.

title: All Los Angeles schools were hit by a huge ransomware attack
description: Los Angeles Unified School District confirms wide-ranging ransomware attack.

title: Netflix must remove LGBTQ+ content in Gulf states or face legal consequences
description: People in Saudi Arabia and neighbouring countries may soon need a good streaming VPN to watch censored Netflix content

title: Intel’s Raptor Lake flagship CPU makes jaws drop as epic 6.5GHz overclock is leaked
description: How fast? Yes, there are catches with hitting that kind of speed, but the Core i9-13900K is getting lots of folks excited.

title: Zoom update could stop your company landing in serious trouble
description: Zoom launches Customer Managed Keys for data encryption, so companies can remain compliant with industry regulations.

title: The white Xbox Elite controller is real and its new price tag is the best thing about it
description: A new Xbox Elite Series 2 controller with a slick white finish is coming soon with a delightfully affordable option.

title: Apple iPhone 14 could pack memory from a Chinese company you’ve never heard of
description: The Apple iPhone 14 will reportedly feature 3D NAND flash from a new supplier.

description: We've heard some details about Apple's 2022 iPad Pro, the sixth entry in its top-end tablet line.

title: Kiwi Farms dropped by second web hosting provider
description: DDoS-Guard acts following complaints days after Cloudflare also blocked Kiwi Farms.

title: Xbox Game Pass adds Disney’s answer to Stardew Valley
description: Disney Dreamlight Valley mashes Animal Crossing with Stardew Valley, and adds heaps of classic cartoon characters.

title: Huawei just beat the iPhone 14 to a key new feature
description: The Huawei Mate 50 line has been announced, complete with satellite messaging and a variable aperture camera.

title: Intel’s new tactic for pushing Arc GPUs: a big bundle of games and apps worth up to $500
description: Some seriously cool games are included, like Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II and Gotham Knights.

title: Meta Connect 2022 gets a date and Zuckerberg teases Oculus Quest 2 successor
description: Meta Connect 2022 is coming on October 11, and the Oculus Quest 2 successor (Project Cambria) will finally get revealed.

title: Google Pixel 7 colors and chipset confirmed hours ahead of the iPhone 14 launch
description: Google has revealed all the colors you'll be able to get the Pixel 7 and Pixel 7 Pro in.

title: A great card game is coming to Steam – don’t believe the Munchkin haters
description: Classic card game Munchkin is getting a digital adaptation, and worth a look if you like satirical fantasy brawls.

title: Brazilian government tells Apple it can't sell iPhones without a charger anymore
description: Brazil says Apple can't sell iPhones without a charger anymore, while also fining the company $2.3 million, saying Apple is selling an "incomplete product".

title: Apple Far Out Event live — gearing up for the (likely) iPhone 14 and Watch 8 launch
description: Ready for the expected iPhone 14 launch? Join us now for all the build up.
